version_description:
Now, it's compatible with Yamaha Digital Pianos.
Please check compatibility chart on https://europe.yamaha.com/en/products/musical_instruments/pianos/apps/smart_pianist/specs.html
Minor problems have been corrected.

Now, it's compatible with Yamaha Digital Pianos.
Please check compatibility chart on https://europe.yamaha.com/en/products/musical_instruments/pianos/apps/smart_pianist/specs.html
Minor problems have been corrected.

Now, it's compatible with Yamaha Digital Pianos.
Please check compatibility chart on https://europe.yamaha.com/en/products/musical_instruments/pianos/apps/smart_pianist/specs.html
Minor problems have been corrected.

Now, it's compatible with Yamaha Digital Pianos.
Please check compatibility chart on https://europe.yamaha.com/en/products/musical_instruments/pianos/apps/smart_pianist/specs.html
Minor problems have been corrected.
This version includes several experience and performance improvements.
This version includes several experience and performance improvements.
This version includes minor bug fixes.
This version includes minor bug fixes.

-Add compatible model (CVP-805, CVP-809, CVP-809GP)

-Add ON/OFF function of Grand Staff View of the Right Part
　　(The Right part can be separated into high- and low- note ranges, and shown in a set of two five-line staves.)

-Add Chord Simplification function for Song.
(When Chord Simplification is set to on, audio data will be analyzed only by using the chords you specified in Detailed Setting.)

-Add compatible model (CVP-805, CVP-809, CVP-809GP)

-Add ON/OFF function of Grand Staff View of the Right Part
　　(The Right part can be separated into high- and low- note ranges, and shown in a set of two five-line staves.)

-Add Chord Simplification function for Song.
(When Chord Simplification is set to on, audio data will be analyzed only by using the chords you specified in Detailed Setting.)

-Add compatible model (CVP-805, CVP-809, CVP-809GP)

-Add ON/OFF function of Grand Staff View of the Right Part
　　(The Right part can be separated into high- and low- note ranges, and shown in a set of two five-line staves.)

-Add Chord Simplification function for Song.
(When Chord Simplification is set to on, audio data will be analyzed only by using the chords you specified in Detailed Setting.)

-Minor bug fixes

-Add compatible model (CVP-805, CVP-809, CVP-809GP)

-Add ON/OFF function of Grand Staff View of the Right Part
　　(The Right part can be separated into high- and low- note ranges, and shown in a set of two five-line staves.)

-Add Chord Simplification function for Song.
(When Chord Simplification is set to on, audio data will be analyzed only by using the chords you specified in Detailed Setting.)

-Minor bug fixes

- Added Software License and Privacy Policy agreement window.
- Improved code analysis accuracy.
